title: Amazing 360 dunk by rookie in NBA pre-season
summary: Amazing 360 dunk by rookie in NBA pre-season
description: NBA rookie Zion Williamson scores a 360 degree dunk for the New Orleans Pelicans, helping them to a 127-125 victory over the Chicago Bulls.

title: Akers wins first Women's World Cup final in 1991
summary: BBC Sport looks back at 1991 when Michelle Akers scored the winning goal in the USA's 2-1 victory over Norway in the first Women's World Cup final.
description: BBC Sport looks back at 1991 when Michelle Akers scored the winning goal in the USA's 2-1 victory over Norway in the first Women's World Cup final. Available to UK users only.

title: Watch: Incredible scenes at Liverpool victory parade
summary: Watch as Liverpool parade the Champions League trophy in front of thousands of fans on their return from Madrid
description: Watch as Liverpool parade the Champions League trophy in front of thousands of fans on their return from Madrid. Pictures courtesy of LFC TV

title: Moeen gets breakthrough after strong Pakistan start
summary: England's Moeen Ali has Pakistan opener Fakhar Zaman stumped for 36 to halt Pakistan in the ICC Men's World Cup game at Trent Bridge.
description: England's Moeen Ali has Pakistan opener Fakhar Zaman stumped for 36 to halt Pakistan in the ICC Men's World Cup game at Trent Bridge. FOLLOW LIVE: England v Pakistan - in-play clips, radio & text. WATCH MORE: The Bangladesh batting spell that inspired victory. Available to UK users only.

title: I thought I'd never play tennis again - Azarenka on pregnancy
summary: Victoria Azarenka says that she thought her 'career was over' when she discovered that she was pregnant with her son Leo.
description: Former tennis world number one Victoria Azarenka tells BBC's Sally Nugent that she thought her 'career was over' when she discovered that she was pregnant with her son Leo. BBC Sport has launched #ChangeTheGame this summer to showcase female athletes in a way they never have been before. Through more live women's sport available to watch across the BBC this summer, complemented by our journalism, we are aiming to turn up the volume on women's sport and alter perceptions. Find out more here.

title: Joshua vows to regain titles after 'minor setback'
summary: Anthony Joshua vows to reclaim his world titles after suffering a shock defeat by Andy Ruiz Jr.
description: Anthony Joshua vows to reclaim his world titles after suffering a shock defeat by Andy Ruiz Jr. READ MORE: Joshua sensationally beaten by Andy Ruiz Jr at Madison Square Garden

title: Man Utd 8-2 Arsenal: Things you've probably forgotten...
summary: Before Manchester United host Arsenal on Monday, BBC Sport looks back at some things you may have forgotten from their entertaining meeting.
description: Before Manchester United host Arsenal on Monday, BBC Sport looks back at some things you may have forgotten from their entertaining meeting, back in August 2011. title: Best moments as Georgia and Wales win at World Cup
summary: Some of the best moments from the Rugby World Cup including two tries that helped Wales beat Australia.
description: Some of the best moments from the Rugby World Cup including two tries that helped Wales beat Australia. MATCH REPORT: Australia 25-29 Wales. MATCH REPORT: Georgia 33-7 Uruguay. Listen to every match of the Rugby World Cup on BBC Radio 5 Live and BBC Radio 5 Live Sports Extra.

title: Smalling explains his decision to go vegan
summary: For a new film exploring the growing trend of veganism in football
description: For a new film exploring the growing trend of veganism in football, AS Roma defender Chris Smalling tells Jermaine Jenas why he turned to a plant-based diet, and how his former Manchester United team-mates became interested by his lifestyle. Watch 'Football Going Vegan: Jermaine Jenas Investigates', available now on BBC iPlayer.
